body:
Sorry if these topics are getting a bit spammy.. But right now i just want to show how the 1v1's will look for my 1v1 Series on Kohi or Kitpvp..
Take a look: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gzoG1xWU_V4&list=UUuVTo8wU_p706eNwNT5TIVA&index=1
I just duel some random people.. But i hope you get the point
 
Render time: 10 minutes
Upload time: 15 minutes
 
I DO NOT OWN THIS MUSIC!
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Desmeon - On That Day (feat. ElDiablo, Flint & Zadik) [NCS Release]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PUpS-...

Laszlo - Don't Look Down [NCS Release]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qtHTR...
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Enyoy! ^.^ The pack im using is my New mashup ill release soon :D

title: Kohi 1v1 (5x) *Example*

replies.body:
http://avicus.net/forums/b85a57986

1v1s with other Avicus players are allowed as long as they don't show the IP address or server name in the title.

Montages from other servers with random players don't belong on the Avicus forums.
